name: SimHarbor
summary:
You have been asked to build a harbor for a town near the Atlantic ocean. With a starting capital of £200,000 from the city council, the work begins!

SimHarbor is a harbor building sim. Set up the piers, equipment and storage needed to service over 120 different ships. Expand your infrastructure, balance your finances and protect your harbor from disasters in this compelling sim.

Reading the manual before jumping in is highly recommended, this is a contender for the HyperCard engine's most complicated game.
